If you have any specific questions, comments or change request, then contact the platform owner for RPIC and RDG.

[![MailButton Icon]][MailLink]

# 

Architectural background information:

- [What is the 'Retail Package Integration Concept' or 'RPIC'?](https://ikea.roadie.so/docs/default/System/rpic)
- [Retail Package Architecture](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IISRPARCH/overview)
- [Architecture Governance](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IISRPARCH/pages/183960165/Architecture+Governance)
- [IIS Retail Package Architecture Forum](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IISRPARCH/pages/183959588/IIS+Retail+Package+Architecture+Forum)

Data Distribution concept architectural guidance and information:
- [Background and reference architecture for Data Distribution](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ARCHITECT/pages/164570808/Data+Distribution+reference+Architecture)
- [Conceptual data distribution scenarios of Data Distribution](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ARCHITECT/pages/164570247/Detailed+Data+Distribution+scenarios)
- [Resend/Replay principle for Data Distribution](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ARCHITECT/pages/164566498/Resend+Replay+Principle)
- [Schema life cycle management principle for Data Distribution](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ARCHITECT/pages/164567082/Schema+Life+Cycle+Management+Principle)
- [Data distribution principle that steer the positioning of systems in IT landscapes](https://inter-ikea.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ARCHITECT/pages/296420557/Data+Distribution+positioning+principle+Draft)
- [Initial Solution Design: IS Retail Package Integration Approach (RPIC and RDG)](https://oneiig.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/IISRetailPackageIntegrationApproach/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7B35E77CE0-B369-4C73-B674-5F9054DCB1A8%7D&file=ISD%20-%20IIS%20Retail%20Package%20Integration%20Approach.docx&action=default&mobileredirect=true)
